originalText.text: So to Aussies coming to new York or anyone wanting a meal like home cooked ,this is the place to come, I could not recommend the pub any higher,uts hard to find an old fashioned meal of good quality in New York , so this is the place you need to come , food is great thanks to the chef , atmosphere was calm and exciting, drinks are good ,staff can't do enough for you ,and are very friendly ,go see and enjoy . So says  Jacko.

originalText.text: Went to Garvey's Irish Pub last night for dinner before going to the theatre. The service was excellent! Thank you Johnny! All 4 of us enjoyed our dinner selections. It was my nieces 12th birthday and they brought out dessert with candle and beautifully decorated singing 'Happy Birthday'. I also noticed the place was immaculate. I would absolutely recommend this restaurant when in NYC. Also the location is perfect if you are seeing a show as it is in the theatre district.

originalText.text: Authentic food to say the least! I enjoyed the 24hr Slow Cooked Bacon & a Shepards Pie! It was super delicious! The have gery good coffee too. I went in just as the packed dining area was clearing out, the patrons were going to the theater next door. Shona was the bartender & she was a sweet girl who on the ball & attentive to her patrons at the bar. The decor was cool & the ambiance relaxing.

originalText.text: I was wandering outside the Hampton Inn which is next door and found this amazing place full of live music and Irish feeling. Being a world traveler I've never felt more at home the bartender Adam took care of all of our drinks Alan was super helpful choosing just the right meal which was the Shepard pie. And Anna at the front door helped us find a seat right away.

originalText.text:
I had an absolutely wonderful experience at Garvey's Irish Bar, largely thanks to the exceptional service provided by their bartender Ana Maria. From the moment I walked in, I was greeted with a warm smile and made to feel right at home.
The bartender's knowledge of drinks was impressive, and they went above and beyond to recommend and craft the perfect cocktail for my taste. Her attention to detail and dedication to customer satisfaction truly stood out.
What impressed me the most was her friendly and engaging personality. She is not only served drinks but also created a fantastic atmosphere.
I can confidently say that the bartender at Garvey's Irish Bar is a true asset to your establishment. Her exceptional service and personality made my visit memorable, and I can't wait to return for another delightful experience. Cheers to a top-notch bartender and a fantastic bar!
